name: Encore Software Services
overview:
Encore provide next generation technology services by collaborating and creating technology enabled business solutions that best suit our clients needs. Encore’s services are backed by its strong domain, technology and business expertise that has been built by conceptualizing, innovating, designing and delivering world class solutions to clients in various industries.

Encore’s niche technology competency focus is on Cloud Computing, Mobility and Business Analytics. The offerings span application management, systems integration, cloud computing, mobility, product engineering, independent verification and validation services, packaged applications implementation, IT infrastructure and data center management services.

Encore differentiates its broad range of services with the technology solution, the people who execute it, the speed and quality of execution, and finally delivery experience and commitment. These have been the key pillars for the continued growth.
